channel.title: End
channel.description:
Today, sadly, I must provide information about my leave of absence. I been thinking this through for a while, and have come to the conclusion that I can no longer be apart of this community. No. This isn't a leaving thread that lists all the wrong in the community; however, a more friendly approach. I'd rather not get into detail why I am leaving but I can safely say that my time is spent more online than outside, so I guess that pretty much sums things up.
I'd like to thank each and everyone of you who helped, talked, and were friends to me. You made my time online enjoyable and much more fun :) Even through thick and thin with some people, it's all in the past, I don't honestly care about past arguments anymore, and I also wish for others that I may have annoyed, hurt, or otherwise criticized to please forgive me. I'd like to make everyone's online time enjoyable, just like mine was, and for the most part, I tried that. I helped others when needed, etc, etc.
Well, enough of the corny old stuff. Anyways, finally, I'd like to thank the MoparScape and MITB Communities for the fun they've brought me and I wish EVERYONE the BEST of luck on their further developments. I will most likely be logging on to see what this community can further achieve; however, I will also most likely NOT post. Just quick logins and logouts. I expect great things, even though this community is stuck in mud right now. You've got great potential with helpful people like Yz85racer, Varek (Stork), etc. The moderators are a wonderful source of information. Follow their lead and take any advice you can from them. They're not your average forumer. They were chosen for specific reasons.
Again, good luck to everyone with whatever they may be using this community for.
Goodbye.
Sincerely, Adam
*Note* - Moderators. Lock at your hearts contempt. I just wanted to leave a short note as to why I wont be active here anymore. Thanks.

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:11, topic:234666”][quote author=foolet link=topic=309438.msg2472188#msg2472188 date=1223067052]
finally seeya fool
[/quote]
3) Adam is a better programmer than you will ever be.[/quote]
Which lead to an argument in a thread resulting in his dislike for Adam.

item.title: End
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

foolet:

finally seeya fool

  1. Who the HELL are you?
  2. Why do you THINK you have any rights.
  3. Adam is a better programmer than you will ever be.
  4. Are you fucking kidding me?
  5. Are you retarded?
  6. What gives you the rights to say this in a leaving topic.
  7. Let’s see some of your work / effort.
  8. What’s wrong with you?
  9. I have never seen you before so… piss off
  10. GTFO the internet NAO!

@Adam

There you go man. This kid is a big douche

I can’t wait to talk to you again.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
